Replace.Text: Each time it is researched it will increase your score and grant: [NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_FOOD] Food from Palace, [NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Ironworks, [NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from East India Company, [NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from Grand Temple, [NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Hermitage, [NEWLINE]+10 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from National College.
